name: Welcome to the team
description:
WARNING! this is a rough demo we made for a corporate game jam. The game is not yet finished and has many rough edges. Please don't share link to this game with other people without our permission!

Welcome to Teamloft! You are our new Game Designer. Faced with a multitude of scenarios, can you avoid getting burnt out from overworking? Will you try to be a people pleaser, suck up to your boss, or will you be fired from the company altogether? Will you make enough money to live out a lavish life or be broke and lonely, with nothing left to gain? 

In 'Welcome to the Team', you are approached with crude and often humorous situations you have to traverse through, just like you would in the office! Can you make it to the release date with your money, relationships and energy intact? Good luck, and have fun!

Swipe characters' portraits left or right to choose one of the answers. Don't be afraid to lose, since this game is meant to be replayed many times. 

Based on real events.

Credits:

Jerry Xia - art, game description

Enona Belosvet - writing, game design

Ali "The Juice Master" Bhojani - animations, UI, music & sounds, additional coding

Valeriy Petrov - coding, game design, writing

Content warning: swearing, mentions of pornography, alcohol abuse, depression and crunch.
